remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution. (Contributed by NM, 16-Dec-2008.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2016.)
statement:
sbc2iedv.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
sbc2iedv.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
sbc2iedv.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
sbc2iedv $p |- ( ph -> ( [. A / x ]. [. B / y ]. ps <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d ch x y $.
$d ph x y $.
